caption: caption1
description: You never know what you have until you have cleaned your house
author: Atharva Gupta

caption: caption2
description: My bed is a magical place I suddenly remember everything I had to do
author: Shouraya Singh

caption: caption3
author: Aviral Gupta
description: Going to bed early. Not going to a party. Not leaving my house. My childhood punishments has become my adult goals

caption: caption4
author: Daksh Chavan
description: If there would be an award for being lazy, I would send someone to pick it up for me
